hello: Hello, I'm a passionate frontend developer with extensive experience in creating websites and sophisticated web applications using JavaScript and Angular. My strength lies in translating innovative design concepts into high-quality code. Thanks to my comprehensive skills and diverse project experiences, I am capable of successfully executing complex projects. I warmly invite you to take a glimpse into my work, which encompasses responsive websites and business applications.
bulp: My goal is to make every project a positive experience for the user. I believe that successful solutions should not only be functional, but also bring real joy to users. To achieve this, I use cutting-edge technologies and my passion for creative innovation to get the best out of every project.
puzzle: I am deeply convinced that the combination of technical brilliance and a strong focus on user needs can lead to truly impressive results. For me, this means ensuring not only that the technical aspects of a project are robust and efficient, but also that they seamlessly match the needs and preferences of the end users.
skillText:
I have gained experience in building projects with various
front end technologies and concepts.
portfolioIntroduction: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
joinDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
polloLocoDecscription: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help El-Pollo-Loco to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer chicken.
pokedexDescription: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
